thread.title: Sofia Vergara & Joe Manganiello Look So in Love at SAG Awards 2017
thread.title_full: Sofia Vergara & Joe Manganiello Look So in Love at SAG Awards 2017

author: Just Jared
title: Sofia Vergara & Joe Manganiello Look So in Love at SAG Awards 2017
text:
How in love do Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello look tonight!?
The hot couple were in attendance at the 2017 Screen Actors Guild Awards on Sunday (January 29) in Los Angeles.
Sofia is nominated with the entire cast of Modern Family in the Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Comedy Series category.
Make sure to tune in for the SAG Awards , airing TONIGHT at 8pm ET/5pm PT on TNT and TBS!
FYI: Sofia is wearing a Zuhair Murad dress.
10+ pictures inside of Sofia Vergara and Joe Manganiello â€¦
